podcast-about-relationships.title: A Podcast About Relationships
podcast-about-relationships.desc: Within CA 155: Introduction to Digital Media Production, I and another student created a mini podcast episode about Long Distance relationships.

beep-boop.title: Beep Boop (Episode 1)
beep-boop.desc: During my third year (Spring 2020), I took a class called CA 449: Sound Cultures and Podcasting, and for my final project I created a short podcast called “Beep Boop” that tackled the question “What is a computer?” in a fun and inviting way.
